mapper.select: SELECT coupung.name, coupung.`OPTION`, coupung.price ,cart.*, pi.URL FROM COUPUNG coupung JOIN CARTS cart ON coupung.COUPUNG_NUMBER = cart.COUPUNG_NUMBER JOIN product_images pi ON cart.coupung_number = pi.coupung_number WHERE cart.CLIENT_ID = #{clientId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARTS(COUPUNG_NUMBER, CLIENT_ID, QUANTITY ) VALUES(#{coupung_number}, #{client_id}, #{quantity})
